Message.En: Battle for Fort Gritten: Uphill Battle
Message.Jp: グリッテン砦攻防戦　戦況：苦戦

Message.En:
For new recruits, it will be a heavy burden of large-scale combat.
The enemy will come at us with increasing ferocity, but showing no openings in their movements.
Relying solely on intuition and individual skills will provide little chance of victory.
Do not overlook the enemy's weak points, but connect your attacks strategically.
Message.Jp:
新兵には荷の重い大規模戦闘となる
敵は狂暴性を増しながらも隙のない動きを見せてくる
勘やセンスに頼った個人技を振りまわすだけでは
勝機は薄いだろう
連係をつなぎ敵の弱点を見逃すな

Message.En:
Escort Leo and defeat the enemy
at the target locations
Message.Jp: レオを護衛し、目標地点の敵を殲滅せよ

Message.En:
An Ambush Unit has appeared,
offering a chance for a War Merit Bonus
Message.Jp: 急襲部隊が出現、戦功ボーナスのチャンス

Message.En:
Defeat the ambush unit you discovered
and receive a War Merit Bonus.
Message.Jp: 発見した急襲部隊を撃破で戦功ボーナス

Message.En:
Lured out the main force of the ambush unit.
A chance for War Merit Bonus.
Message.Jp: 急襲部隊の本隊を誘い出した。戦功ボーナスのチャンス

Message.En:
Defeat the ambush unit you discovered and receive
a War Merit Bonus.
Message.Jp: 発見した急襲部隊を撃破で戦功ボーナス

Message.En:
Defeat the battalion commander and complete the
defense.
Message.Jp: 大隊長を撃破し、防衛を完遂せよ

Message.En:
Battle for Fort Gritten: Uphill Battle
(Result Reward)
Message.Jp: グリッテン砦攻防戦：苦戦《リザルト報酬》

Message.En:
It will be a tough and large-scale battle for new recruits.
In order to overcome the fierce and cunning enemies that cannot be dealt with by individual skills alone,
exploit their weaknesses and coordinate attacks.
Message.Jp:
新兵には厳しい大規模戦闘となる
狂暴かつ狡猾な敵に個人技だけでは
太刀打ちできない弱点をついて連係せよ
